housing.core.api¶

Description

Core utilities common to all usecases.

This is a namespace housing all the core utilties that could be useful to an end user. This includes IO utilities, Job management utilities and utilities to manage project configuration.

Functions

contextmanager(func)

@contextmanager decorator.

create_client(cfg)

Create a tracking client.

create_context(config_file)

Create a context object from a config file path.

Split the provided dataset using custom criteria.

To display multiple dataset outputs as tabbed panes.
